pr_title: fix: Expire user's active sessions when password is changed

timeline.message:
fix: Expire user's active sessions when password is changed

When an admin changes a user's password the user's active sessions should
be expired and the user forced to login again with the new password.

Issue: [DHIS2-8570]
Signed-off-by: Morten Svanaes <msvanaes@dhis2.org>

timeline.bodyText: If anyone have any suggestions or comments that would be nice, I would very much like this to not be allowed i.e. currentUser == NULL > cast exception

replies.bodyText: As long as the thread has a bound security context (as it always should have, unless using mocking mvc test I guess), it should never be null.. so feel free to throw an exception if it actually is null
